name: BEAT CRUSHED
description:
BEAT CRUSHED is a rhythm-based platformer game where you must bop your way to heaven while avoiding the moving walls of God's Fury. Your beloved childhood dog is waiting for you up there!

BEAT CRUSHED was created for the Texas Game Jam 2021.

This game is very much a work in progress; we're aware of bugs and other issues at the moment and are planning on fixing them in the future, as well as adding more levels!

Controls (We have controller support for Xbox!)

WASD or arrows: move

Spacebar: jump      

Left Stick: move

A button: jump

Credits
